name: Air War
description:
Fly as Supermarine Spitfire and fight Messerschmitts BF109!

My best game so far!
I did my absolute best when it comes to graphics and little effects, like the weather.
I'm also very glad I finally made my own engines for drawing text letter by letter, blackscreen and screenshake. I'm definitely going to use them in the future.

Well, the game ended up a bit complex, but as a person who mastered the controls, I can proudly say it's fun to play once you get it. :^)
I hope you'll also have fun with it, see ya! ^~^
